parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPS system can cause the loss of power steering assist, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Intermittent or complete loss of power steering
difficulty turning the steering wheel
stiff or hard steering
steering wheel locking up or jerking
service power steering warning light on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering rack and pinion can cause the loss of power steering assist, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Intermittent or complete loss of power steering
difficulty turning the steering wheel
stiff or hard steering
steering wheel locking up or jerking
service power steering warning light on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the loss of power steering assist, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Intermittent or complete loss of power steering
difficulty turning the steering wheel
stiff or hard steering
steering wheel locking up or jerking
service power steering warning light on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Crankshaft Position Sensor Tone Wheel Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft position sensor tone wheel can cause the engine to stall, leading to a loss of motive power and increasing the risk of a vehicle crash without prior warning.
symptoms: The vehicle may experience a sudden loss of power
the engine may stall
and the check engine light may illuminate. In some cases
the vehicle may not restart after stalling.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Exhaust Manifold and Exhaust System Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the exhaust manifold and exhaust system can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to a loss of motive power and increasing the risk of a vehicle crash. Additionally, the release of raw engine exhaust fumes into the cabin can cause injury to occupants.
symptoms: The vehicle may experience a loud ticking noise
exhaust leaks
and the check engine light may illuminate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission and shifting system can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to a loss of motive power and increasing the risk of a vehicle crash. Additionally, the sudden and unexpected shifting of gears can cause loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: The vehicle may experience sudden and unexpected shifting of gears
loss of power
and the check engine light may illuminate.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Drive Shaft and Rear Differential Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the drive shaft and rear differential can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to a loss of motive power and increasing the risk of a vehicle crash.
symptoms: The vehicle may experience a loud banging noise
loss of power
and the check engine light may illuminate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the high-pressure fuel pump can cause the engine to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: The engine stalls or loses power
especially at high speeds
the vehicle may not start
or the fuel pump may make a loud noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine crankshaft can cause the engine to seize, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: The engine seizes
makes a loud noise
or stalls
especially at high speeds
the vehicle may not start
or metal shavings may be found in the oil pan.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Exhaust Manifold Leaks and Broken Bolts
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Exhaust manifold leaks and broken bolts can cause carbon monoxide to leak into the passenger compartment, posing a health risk to occupants.
symptoms: Exhaust fumes are present in the passenger compartment
the engine makes a loud noise
or the vehicle has decreased performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Throttle body issues can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or stranding the driver.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or loses power
especially at high speeds
the throttle body makes a loud noise
or the "Service Electronic Throttle Immediately" message is displayed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Delays in recall repairs and parts availability can leave vehicles in an unsafe condition, posing a risk to drivers and passengers.
symptoms: Dealerships are unable to repair vehicles due to parts availability
or repairs are delayed
leaving vehicles in an unsafe condition.
